job description:
A San Francisco based real estate and temporary housing solution startup is hiring for a Python Data Engineer to finish building their data warehouse and data ingestion system and can pay up to $160k/year for the right person.

Thepany was founded a couple years ago and is growing rapidly. They have significant investment from a few different prominent venture capital firms and are trying to solve the problem of temporary luxury housing for people on work assignments. They are ideally looking for someone who has at least 2 years of Data Engineering experience with a C.S. degree. Their tech stack is Python, RoR, and Postgres, although they are open to people with Data Engineering experience in different languages. All candidates should be local to San Francisco. No sponsorship or C2C is available for this role.

Required Skills & Experience
  • 2+ years of Data Engineering experience
  • Strong ability to code in Python and Ruby
  • B.S. in C.S. or equivalent
    • Desired Skills & Experience
  • Experience with Postgres
  • Have built a Data Warehouse in the past
  • Experience with Docker
  • Experience working in a small startup environment
    • What You Will Be Doing
  • 100% Hands On
    • The Offer

    You will receive the following benefits:
  • Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Paid Sick Time Leave
  • Pre-taxmuter Benefit
